title: Exploring Rock Bands in the USA
subtitle: Rocking the USA: Discover With Us the Rock Groups and the Sound of Guns N’ Roses and Red Hot Chili Peppers
curator: Serena Sciortino, Gilda Gitto, Vito Antonio Miccoli
description: Get ready for an amazing adventure into the world of rock music in the USA. We'll explore the huge number of bands, the exciting stadiums they perform in, and the talented members that make up these groups. We'll also discover when these bands formed. Along the way, we'll see cool pictures of rock bands and their unique styles. Plus, we'll dive into the story of Guns N' Roses, learning about their band members, hit albums, and when they were released. In addition, during our journey we have also encountered the majestic band of the Red Hot Chili Peppers. Get ready to rock out to the incredible music and stories that define American rock!

dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT (year(xsd:dateTime(?date)) as ?label)  (COUNT(?label) AS ?count)
WHERE {
     ?band ?a wd:Q5741069 . # rock band 
     ?band wdt:P495 wd:Q20 . # from USA
     ?band wdt:P2031 ?date . # formation year         
     SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?band rdfs:label ?label.
      }

}

GROUP BY ?count ?date
ORDER BY ?label
LIMIT 20

dynamic_elements.chart_title: Rock Bands: Group Names and Number of Members
dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?label (COUNT(?item) AS ?count) 
WHERE { ?band ?a wd:Q5741069 . # rock band 
       ?band wdt:P495 wd:Q30 . # from USA 
       ?band wdt:P527 ?item . 
       SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". ?band rdfs:label ?label. } } 
GROUP BY ?label 
ORDER BY DESC(?count) 
LIMIT 30

dynamic_elements.table_title: Guns N' Roses: Members, Birth Date and Occupation
dynamic_elements.table_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?Member ?MemberLabel (year(xsd:dateTime(?BirthDate)) as ?Birth)   ?occupation ?occupationLabel 
WHERE { wd:Q11895 wdt:P527 ?Member . ?Member wdt:P569 ?BirthDate . 
             OPTIONAL {?Member wdt:P1303 ?occupation.} 
       SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".} } LIMIT 10
